562.quoteText: We may suspend the Services or terminate the Agreement if you, your users, or attendees are using the Services in a manner that is likely to cause harm to us.
562.title: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

tosdr.case: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

572.quoteText: all payments you make to us for access to the Services are final and non-refundable
572.title: LastPass will not provide refunds if they terminate you account or terminate the service

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy
tosdr.tldr: LastPass has the right (though not the obligation) to, in LastPass' sole discretion (i) refuse or remove any content that, in LastPass' reasonable opinion, violates any LastPass policy or is in any way harmful or objectionable, or (ii) terminate or deny access to and use of the Website to any individual or entity for any reason, in LastPass' sole discretion. LastPass will have no obligation to provide a refund of any amounts previously paid.

576.quoteText: Either party may terminate the Agreement (i) if the other party breaches its material obligations and fails to cure within 30 days of receipt of written notice, or (ii) if the other party becomes insolvent or bankrupt, liquidated or is dissolved, or ceases substantially all of its business, and we may suspend access or terminate immediately if you breach Section 1.2, 4 or 5.
576.title: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.

tosdr.case: User suspension from the service will be fair and proportionate.
tosdr.tldr: LastPass has the right (though not the obligation) to, in LastPass' sole discretion (i) refuse or remove any content that, in LastPass' reasonable opinion, violates any LastPass policy or is in any way harmful or objectionable, or (ii) terminate or deny access to and use of the Website to any individual or entity for any reason, in LastPass' sole discretion.

700.title: Their legal documents are published under a Creative Commons license

tosdr.case: legal documents published under reusable license
tosdr.tldr: This means that other services can reuse phrases from these documents if they want to.

1029.title: LastPass never has clear-text versions of your critical data, including passwords or master password

tosdr.tldr: They don't allow you to send LastPass critically important information like your usernames, passwords, account notes, and LastPass master password; instead your LastPass master password is used locally to encrypt the important data that's sent to us so that no one, including LastPass employees ever can access it.

1043.quoteText: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes to our information practices. If we make any material changes we will provide notice on this website, and we may notify you by email (sent to the e-mail address specified in your account), prior to the change becoming effective. We encourage you to periodically review this page for the latest information on our privacy practices. If you continue to use the Services after those changes are in effect, you agree to the revised policy.
1043.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
tosdr.tldr: LastPass may change its Privacy Statement and Terms of Service at their sole discretion. LastPass expects visitors to frequently check the website for any changes to their Privacy Statement and Terms. Your continued use of or access to the Website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes. For material changes, the user will be notified, though.
